revision.text:
{{Multiple issues| {{Tone|date=April 2020}} {{BLP sources|date=April 2020}} }} '''Peter O'Brian''' (born July 27, 1956) is a [[New Zealand]] [[actor]] best known for playing Alex Tarambuan in the movie ''[[The Intruder (1986 film)|The Intruder]]''.<ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.bulletproofaction.com/2017/10/06/bullet-points-the-intruder-1986/|website=www.bulletproofaction.com|access-date=2020-04-26}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.theweekendsun.co.nz/news/1564-fighting-films-stardom-and-sin.html|title=The Weekend Sun {{!}} Fighting, films, stardom and sin|website=www.theweekendsun.co.nz|access-date=2020-04-26}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web|url=https://www.stuff.co.nz/entertainment/film/115552072/operation-rambu-sheds-light-on-the-unknown-kiwi-who-became-an-indonesian-action-star|title=Operation: Rambu! sheds light on the unknown Kiwi who became an Indonesian action star|website=Stuff|language=en|access-date=2020-04-26}}</ref> He is not to be confused with the Australian actor [[Peter O'Brien (actor)|Peter O'Brien]].
O'Brian has only featured in strictly [[Indonesia]]n productions. Nearly all of his movies have involved Arizal or the Indonesian producers The Punjabi Brothers; he has also worked closely with Jopi Burnama. ''[[The Stabilizer]]'' was O'Brian's first movie.
O'Brian is planning to make a comeback to the screen, and eagerly plans to do Feature Films in [[New Zealand]] and abroad.
==Filmography== *''[[The Stabilizer]]'' (1986) [Segi Tiga Emas] *''[[The Intruder (1986 film)|The Intruder]]'' (1986) [Pembalasan Rambu] *''[[Forceful Impact]] 1987 [Arizal] *''[[Jungle Heat]]'' (1988) [Rimba Panas] *''[[Double Crosser]]'' (1989) [Membakar Lingkaran Api] *''Lethal Hunter aka [[American Hunter]]'' (1990) [Pemburu Berdarah Dingin] *''[[Angel of Fury|Triple Cross]]'' aka ''Angel of Fury'' (1990) [Pertempuran Segi Tiga] *''[[Time Game]] 1998 [Sanu Samtani (Rapi Film) *''[[Operation: RAMBU!]]'' (Documentary) 2019
==Trivia==
* His real name is Peter John Wilson * O'Brian once had a huge falling out with Jopi Burnama, the producer of [[The Intruder (1986 film)]] over the opening scene in which an old lady, [[Bu Yadi]] was at fault for the car accident. * O'Brian has played an evil character in two films; [[Angel of Fury|Triple Cross]] and [[Lethal Hunter]]. * O'Brians most eloquent and interesting character is "Peter" in Jungle Heat. O'Brian expertly juxtaposes the character's tendency to use foul language with his "wow" expression in the scene where Peter is chosen as the suitor. * Apparently, Peter O'Brian has a big following amongst [[Milton Keynes Dons]] fans. * When filming The Intruder, Peter O'Brian actually took a severe blow to the sternum during a fight scene. * The VHS version of Triple Cross released in the US under the alternative title of Angel Of Fury has been re-dubbed and is heavily cut. Cuts have been made to both scenes of violence and dialogue. * He taught English and Humanities in Mentari International School in Jakarta (MISJ) * He starred in the pop video 'Weed Bus' by Liverpool group, The Stairs - he portrayed 'Tony Beep-Beep'
